nodes.name: project
nodes.description: Any specifically defined piece of work that is undertaken or attempted to meet a single requirement. (NCIt C47885)

properties.name: availability_mechanism
properties.description: Mechanism by which the project will be made avilable.

properties.name: availability_type
properties.description: Is the project open or restricted?

properties.name: code
properties.description: Unique identifier for the project.

properties.name: date_collected
properties.description: The date or date range in which the project data was collected.

properties.name: dbgap_accession_number
properties.description: The dbgap accession number provided for the project.

properties.name: intended_release_date
properties.description: Tracks a Project's intended release date.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Display name/brief description for the project.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'project' table.

nodes.name: study
nodes.description: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.

properties.name: prometheus_study_id
properties.description: The Prometheus Study Identifier for this study.

properties.name: project_number
properties.description: The project number for this study.

properties.name: institution
properties.description: The name of the affiliated institution.

properties.name: principal_investigator
properties.description: The name of the principal investigator.

properties.name: investigators
properties.description: The names of the investigators.

properties.name: study_description
properties.description: A brief description of the study being performed. Free text

properties.name: data_description
properties.description: Brief description of the data being provided for this study. Free text

properties.name: study_type
properties.description: The type of study from controlled vocabulary.

properties.name: subject_type
properties.description: The type of subjects from controlled vocabulary.

properties.name: research_program
properties.description: The research program associated with the study.

properties.name: research_focus_area
properties.description: The research focus area for the study.

properties.name: version
properties.description: The current study version in the data commons.

properties.name: last_updated
properties.description: A combination of date and time of day in the form [-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm]

properties.name: access_type
properties.description: The type of access for this study.

properties.name: accural_status
properties.description: The accrual status of the study.

properties.name: hosted_commons
properties.description: The data commons and environments where the study data is hosted.

properties.name: geographical_region
properties.description: The geographical regions associated with the study.

properties.name: military_population
properties.description: The military population of the study.

properties.name: study_registration
properties.description: External source from which the identifier included in study_id originates.

properties.name: study_id
properties.description: Unique identifier that can be used to retrieve more information for a study.

properties.name: dbgap_accession
properties.description: The dbgap accession number provided for the project (example, phs123456.v1.p1.c1).

properties.name: short_name
properties.description: The shorthand name for the project.

properties.name: full_name
properties.description: The full name for the project.

properties.name: complete
properties.description: Description of whether the project submission is complete or still in progress.

properties.name: project.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'project' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'study' table.

properties.name: study.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'study' table.

nodes.name: subject
nodes.description: The collection of all data related to a specific patient, case, or subject in the context of a specific dataset or experiment.

properties.name: age_at_index
properties.description: The study participant's age, in years, at the index event. The index event is determined by the data submitter and used as an anchor date for all temporal variables. Note that an age of 0 indicates a participant who is younger than 1 year old. For participants with ages greater than 89 years, please use the property 'age_at_index_gt89'.

properties.name: age_at_index_gt89
properties.description: Indicates whether the subject's age at the time of the study was greater than 89 years.

properties.name: consent_codes
properties.description:
Data Use Restrictions that are used to indicate  permissions/restrictions for datasets and/or materials, and relates to the purposes for which datasets and/or material might be removed, stored or used. 
 Based on the Data Use Ontology : see http://www.obofoundry.org/ontology/duo.html 
 GRU - For general research use for any research purpose. Example of usage: This includes but is not limited to: health/medical/biomedical purposes, fundamental biology research, the study of population origins or ancestry, statistical methods and algorithms development, and social-sciences research. 
 HMB - Use of the data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes; does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. 
 DS-X - Use of the data must be related to [disease]. 
 NPU - Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations and not-for-profit use, non-commercial use. 
 IRB - Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB/REC approval.

properties.name: ethnicity
properties.description: The ethnicity of the subject.

properties.name: gender
properties.description: Text designations that identify gender. Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles. [Explanatory Comment 1: Identification of gender is based upon self-report and may come from a form, questionnaire, interview, etc.]

properties.name: biological_sex
properties.description: The biological sex of the subject.

properties.name: year_born
properties.description: The year of birth of the subject.

properties.name: race
properties.description: An arbitrary classification of a taxonomic group that is a division of a species. It usually arises as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and is characterized by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in the case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution. The provided values are based on the categories defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Business and used by the U.S. Census Bureau.

properties.name: subject_id
properties.description: An additional identifier for the subject.

properties.name: prometheus_global_id
properties.description: The Prometheus Global Identifier for the subject.

properties.name: apollo_id
properties.description: The Apollo Identifier for the subject.

properties.name: results_type
properties.description: The type of results for this subject (example, ["metabolomic"]).

properties.name: study.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'study' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'subject' table.

properties.name: subject.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'subject' table.

nodes.name: exposure
nodes.description: Clinically relevant patient information not immediately resulting from genetic predispositions.

properties.name: smoking_status
properties.description: Smoking condition (HARMONIZED)

properties.name: years_smoked
properties.description: Numeric value (or unknown) to represent the number of years a person has been smoking.

properties.name: years_smoked_gt89
properties.description: Indicate whether the numeric value to represent the number of years a person has been smoking (HARMONIZED) is greater than 89 years.

properties.name: current_smoker_baseline
properties.description: Indicates whether subject currently smokes cigarettes. (HARMONIZED)

properties.name: age_at_current_smoker_baseline
properties.description: age at measurement of current_smoker_baseline (years) (HARMONIZED)

properties.name: age_at_ever_smoker_baseline
properties.description: age at measurement of ever_smoker_baseline (years) (HARMONIZED)

properties.name: ever_smoker_baseline
properties.description: Indicates whether subject ever regularly smoked cigarettes. (HARMONIZED)

properties.name: unit_current_smoker_baseline
properties.description: harmonization unit for current_smoker_baseline (A "harmonization unit" is a defined group of subjects whose phenotypes can be similarly processed.) (HARMONIZED)

properties.name: unit_ever_smoker_baseline
properties.description: harmonization unit for ever_smoker_baseline (A "harmonization unit" is a defined group of subjects whose phenotypes can be similarly processed.) (HARMONIZED)

properties.name: exposure_category
properties.description: The category of exposure.

properties.name: exposure_type
properties.description: The type of exposure.

properties.name: exposure_agent
properties.description: The agent of exposure.

properties.name: exposure_job
properties.description: The type of employment during the exposure.

properties.name: exposure_start_date
properties.description: A combination of date and time of day in the form [-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm]

properties.name: exposure_end_date
properties.description: A combination of date and time of day in the form [-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm]

properties.name: exposure_method
properties.description: The method of exposure.

properties.name: exposure_frequency
properties.description: The type of employment during the exposure.

properties.name: exposure_protection
properties.description: Indicates whether subject wore protection during the exposure.

properties.name: exposure_protection_yes
properties.description: Indicates the type of protection if the subject wore protection

properties.name: results_file
properties.description: The results file for exposure data.

properties.name: data_type
properties.description: The type of file for the subject-metabolite combination.

properties.name: guid
properties.description: The GUID for the exposure data results file.

properties.name: subject.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'subject' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'exposure' table.

properties.name: exposure.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'exposure' table.

properties.name: file_names

nodes.name: sample
nodes.description: Any biological or material sample used for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions.

properties.name: biospecimen_anatomic_site
properties.description: Text term that represents the name of the primary disease site of the submitted tumor sample.

properties.name: biospecimen_anatomic_site_detail
properties.description: Tissue type, more specific detail of tissue type.

properties.name: biospecimen_anatomic_site_uberon_id
properties.description: Uberon ID, anatomical location as described by the Uber Anatomy Ontology (UBERON)

properties.name: biospecimen_anatomic_site_uberon_term
properties.description: Uberon Term, anatomical location as described by the Uber Anatomy Ontology (UBERON)

properties.name: sample_type
properties.description: Original material type of the collected sample

properties.name: tissue_type
properties.description: Text term that represents a description of the kind of tissue collected with respect to disease status or proximity to tumor tissue.

properties.name: specimen_id
properties.description: Unique identifier that can be used to retrieve more information for a specimen.

properties.name: subject.id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'subject' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'sample' table.

properties.name: sample.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'sample' table.

properties.name: medical_record.id
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'medical_record' table.

nodes.name: metabolomic
nodes.description: Pertaining to the study and analysis of metabolites within a biological system; involves the identification and quantification of small molecules produced during metabolism.

properties.name: windber_id
properties.description: The Windber ID for the metabolite.

properties.name: casrn
properties.description: The Chemical Abstracts Service Registry Number (CASRN) for the metabolite.

properties.name: dtxs_id
properties.description: The Distributed Structure-Searchable Toxicity Identifier (DTXSID) for the metabolite.

properties.name: name_tar
properties.description: The target compound name for the metabolite.

properties.name: reference
properties.description: The reference or citation for the metabolite.

properties.name: carcinogen
properties.description: Indicates whether the metabolite is carcinogenic.

properties.name: chemical_class
properties.description: The chemical class for the metabolite.

properties.name: results_file
properties.description: The file containing results for the subject-metabolite combination.

properties.description: The type of file for the subject-metabolite combination.

properties.name: guid

properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'sample' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'metabolomic' table.

properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'metabolomic' table.
